roleset.name: bring to completion
roleset.note: CONSUMMATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'consummate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No Framenet entry. Comparison with 'complete'. (from consummate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: A unit of DPC Acquisition Partners launched a $10-a-share tender offer for the shares outstanding of Dataproducts Corp., and said it would seek to liquidate the computer-printer maker ``as soon as possible,'' even if [a merger]-1 isn't consummated *trace*-1.

example.name: ARG1
example.text: The executives say Time may seek to break up the transaction after it is consummated , or may seek constraints that would prevent Tele - Communications from dropping HBO in any of its cable systems in favor of Showtime .
